answers.answer: Have you lost any weight? if so how much?What is your blood pressure?Have you got anymore symptoms along with the sickness, like muscle fatigue, etc..Sorry to ask a lot of questions, but im just trying to figure it out and i need some more info.You have diabetes, and PCOS. have you had your Adrenals checked?Please keep me postedNicola

i have lost weight over the past 6 months...about 6-10 pounds.  My blood pressure is a little high, and i told my endocronologist about the symptoms and i get blood every 3 months so im sure if something came up he wouldve said something.  It's so weird.  Thanks for responding.
Has a gallbladder problem been ruled out?Another condition could be Gastroparesis which is associated with Diabetes.

question: I have been vomiting on and off for 6 months. For a while, It was happening daily.  I saw a GI doctor who did an Endoscopy and didn't see anything. He put me on Aciphex, which helped, but I still vomit and or gag atleast 1x a week.  I am not pregnant.  I do have type II diabetes and PCOS.  Anyone else sturggling with this kind of situation?
title: Vomiting for 6 months
